name: coaxial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
sharing an axis (= central point): coaxial lines
a coaxial cable has two concentric wires (= wires that share a central point) to conduct the signal, separated by an insulating layer: Cable TV channels and internet services are usually transmitted to a home or business via coaxial cable.
